        <payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.EncriptDecriptScope</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EncriptDecriptScope</name><script><![CDATA[var EncriptDecriptScope = Class.create();
EncriptDecriptScope.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    decrypt: function(key){
		var ge = new GlideEncrypter();
		return ge.decrypt(key);
	},
	encript: function (key){
		var ge = new GlideEncrypter();
		return ge.encrypt(key);
	},
    type: 'EncriptDecriptScope'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-01 15:54:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>b9202fe0db0b101032ffe1bb4b9619b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EncriptDecriptScope</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b9202fe0db0b101032ffe1bb4b9619b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-01 16:07:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update></payload>
